ValidationRule.description: Ready to close cannot be marked as true till PO is in released Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Purchase_Order', Ready_to_Close__c = True, OR(ISPICKVAL(PO_Status__c, 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(PO_Status__c, 'In Approval'), ISPICKVAL(PO_Status__c, 'Approved')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready to Close cannot be Marked as True till PO Status is Released
